original_text:
For the moth will eat them up like a garment,
    and the worm will eat them like wool,
but my righteousness will be forever,
    and my salvation to all generations.”
korean_text: 옷 같이 좀이 그들을 먹을 것이며 양털 같이 좀벌레가 그들을 먹을 것이나 나의 공의는 영원히 있겠고 나의 구원은 세세에 미치리라

sentences.original_text: For the moth will eat them up like a garment,
sentences.korean_translation: 나방이 그것을 옷처럼 먹어 버릴 것이니,

sentences.original_text: and the worm will eat them like wool,
sentences.korean_translation: 좀벌레가 그것을 양털처럼 갉아 먹을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: but my righteousness will be forever,
and my salvation to all generations.”
